name: Countryside Alliance
membership: We belong to FACE-UK which feeds into Federation of European Hunting Associations (FACE).
goal: The Countryside Alliance works for everyone who loves the countryside and the rural way of life. Our aim is to protect and promote life in the countryside and to help it thrive.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Climate Action, Customs, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives: Animal Welfare, Environment, Firearms, Food Labeling, Digital Communications, Agriculture, Wildlife Management, Invasive Alien Species,  Rural Services and Communities and Brexit and the UK's future relationship with the EU.
